resources.string: Server IP has not been set yet.

Error reading setting if this is the first app start
Server unavailable.\nHave you configured it in the layout\nand started it via Control > Start Server?
Can\'t synchronize game time while game is not running.
Your LiveSplit server may be outdated.\nPlease use the newest version or this app won\'t work properly.
The network can\'t keep up with the requests and messes up!\nMaybe you need to increase the polling delay.
Time between automatic timer synchronization.\nLower values may drain your battery faster.
Time to wait until deciding that something went wrong

This is a remote for the timer program LiveSplit.

In order to work you need to add
Control > LiveSplit Server to your layout and then start the server on the main window with
Rightclick > Control > Start Server.

The app requires an IP to know where to connect to your LiveSplit computer.

Development continues on GitHub.

If you want to contact me:
- GitHub
- Speedrun Tool Development Discord
- Email

This seems to be your first app start,
do you want to see a guide on how to set LiveSplit up with this app?

The guide is also accessible from the menu.

This guide will show you how to set up LiveSplit to work with this app.

It is also available on GitHub.

It is recommended to open the guide on your LiveSplit computer, so you can just click on the links there.

Download and extract LiveSplit 1.7 or newer:

http://livesplit.org/downloads/

Download and extract the LiveSplit server component (LiveSplit.Server_1.7.x.zip or newer) into the LiveSplit \"components\" sub-directory:

https://github.com/LiveSplit/LiveSplit.Server/releases
Add the LiveSplit Server component to your layout

Note your IP, you will need it for the app (You may also change port if necessary).

(This IP is needed so the app knows how to connect to your LiveSplit computer.)
Start the server (Windows may ask for firewall permissions, you have to allow it)
Go to the app settings and enter your IP (and port if you changed it)
